mobs.long_desc: A gremlin glares at you, its drool dripping on the ground.
mobs.desc: A small creature, around 2 feet high, scurries around on the ground, occasionally breaking items at random. It seems to be rather destructive and mindless.

mobs.long_desc: The gremlin lord sits upon his throne of bones.
mobs.desc: A silly looking creature sits upon a makeshift throne of bones and wearing an iron ring on his head. He seems to be a little larger than the others of his kind, which would probably explains why he leads them.
A half decayed corpse is walking around aimlessly here. A slimy green substance is left behind in its wake and a horrible stench preceeds it. You feel like throwing up.
An ethereal being floats past you, moaning softly to itself. It seems to be looking for something but its rather obvious that it hasn't had much success.

mobs.long_desc: A stone flies straight at you.
mobs.desc: A shadowy being is here and it seems to be hurling all sorts of items straight at you. It seems to be angry at something and it's now trying to let off all that steam.

mobs.long_desc: There is a skeleton in the closet.
mobs.desc: It is not a huge skeleton -- probably it was a small child in the past-- but it moves with eerie grace, and seems to be able to see through its rotted and empty eye-sockets. It makes odd creaking, clicking noises as it moves.

mobs.long_desc: A small furry creature is running around, picking up stuff.
mobs.desc: A small doglike creature scurries here and there, sniffing out things to gather up. It has a vast amount of junk in its two humanlike hands, and occasionally sniffs at them affectionately.

mobs.long_desc: A bat flaps around above you.
mobs.desc: A small bat flits around aimlessly. Though it is small, its teeth seem long and sharp.

mobs.long_desc: A rat scurries around, nibbling on garbage.
mobs.desc: A small, brown rat scurries around on the floor, looking for something to eat. It seems to be a little malnourished.

mobs.long_desc: A ferocious beast charges at you.
mobs.desc: This half-rat, half-dog creature walks erect on two feet, but its paws have red-stained claws, and its long, rodentlike teeth have bits of flesh dangling from them. Its glowing red eyes look quite insane.

mobs.keywords: necromancer Asiri'Qaxt woman beautiful alabaster maiden guildmaster
mobs.long_desc: Asiri'Qaxt, the Necromancer guildmaster, waits here.
mobs.desc: She is tall and willowy, with milk-pale skin and pale blonde hair that flows down her back like water. Her eyes, ice-green and limpid, are almost completely expressionless.

mobs.long_desc: An ancient and long dead knight challenges you to pass.
mobs.desc: In armor long forgotten, this creature cannot be of this world.  It is hulking and very agile looking.  Peering in through its visor you see large chunks of its face are rotted away.  It must have been a slain warrior, reanimated to serve a new evil master.

objects.ground: A brown potion lies in the dust.

extras.text: A viscous brown liquid sloshed in the vial as you hold it up to the light. It smells rather awful and looks disgusting so its probably good for you.

objects.ground: A dulled, silver knife lies on the ground.

extras.text: The knife has ornate carvings on its hilt, and the name McGuire is prominent on the hilt. It was probably part of the silver set of this house.

objects.ground: A pair of white boots is here.

extras.text: The boots are made of a strange sort of leather which is totally white.  There is a rather strange feel to it too.

objects.ground: A large bone lies half buried in the ground.

extras.text: The bone is rather heavy, and can deliver quite a punch.  Strangely, the balance is good enough for you to swing it like a club.

objects.ground: A furry, black mushroom is growing on the wall.

extras.text: The mushroom looks disgusting, but it has a surprisingly nice aroma.  It seems to say, come on, take a nibble ....

objects.ground: A murky green potion is here.

extras.text: The liquid has an odd astringent odour which reminds you of castor oil from your youth.

objects.ground: A sparkling diamond ring catches your eye.

extras.text: The diamond sparkles with a merry light, as if it were alive.  You can't help but admire the skill of the jeweler.
The shroud is a near transparent piece of linen which once wrapped a body.  It is just long enough for you to drape it around yours.  But to wear a piece of cloth which once adorned a corpse?

triggers.name: necromancer_guild
triggers.commands: *for 16950 if %actor.class% == Necromancer wait 1s wdoor 16950 up room 16932 wecho The ceiling slides open silently. wait 30s wdoor 16950 up purge wecho The ceiling slides closed with a click. elseif end

rooms.name: The Overgrown Path
rooms.description: A cobblestone path leads up to an old, deserted house. All sorts of creeping plants and shrubs grow over the walk, giving it a slightly ominous look. Windy Way lies to the west.

West.description: Windy Way lies just west of here.

rooms.name: House Porch
rooms.description: The floorboards creak as you step up to the door.  Cobwebs of incredible size hang above you and vines grow all over this place.  Before you, a solid oak door bars your way into the house.

East.description: Although the door looks weathered and aged, there it resists your attempts to open it for a moment. As you push the door, a horrible squeaking sound can be heard, but it could be the rust on the hinges, or is it?

extras.text: The cobwebs looks like it has been here for ages, and its inhabitants seem to have become quite robust. Stuck on one of the cobwebs is the carcass of a doormouse. It seems to have fallen prey to a spider.

rooms.name: The Closet
rooms.description: It is dark and dank in this closet.  Tattered garments hang from the hangers, it is rather obvious that the former occupants didn't bother to take their belongings with them.

South.description: A flimsy wooden door is there.

rooms.name: The Library
rooms.description: Bookshelves line the walls, but the books they once held are now scattered all over the ground.  A musty smell permeates the air, making you sneeze. There also seems to be a strange sense of emptiness here.

extras.text: These books are badly damaged. They crumble even as you touch them. Some of the bookshelves are also broken, as if someone came around and started smashing up the place.

rooms.name: The Library
rooms.description: Bookshelves line the walls, but the books they once held are now scattered all over the ground.  A musty smell permeates the air, making you sneeze. There also seems to be a strange sense of emptiness here.

extras.text: These books are badly damaged. They crumble even as you touch them. Some of the bookshelves are also broken, as if someone came around and started smashing up the place.

rooms.name: Greenhouse
rooms.description: The glass walls of this greenhouse have been mostly broken up.  Shards of glass are scattered on the ground.  It's just like a strong force just bashed the walls in.  Broken pots and dead saplings lie everywhere.  It is rather strange that the saplings haven't decayed yet.  It is just like the damage happened only yesterday.

rooms.name: The Hall
rooms.description: You stand in a very spacious hall which has seen better days.  A long corridor leads into the east wing and a dark hallway leads to the south wing. A once magnificent staircase leads up to the upper floors of this house.  A closet is to the north.

North.description: A flimsy wooden door is there, and it looks like a closet.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: The hall stretches on to the east, towards what was previously the east wing.  Your footsteps echo in this dank, forbidding place, and the shadows seem to leap out at you.  Low moaning sounds can be heard coming from the walls.  A sinister presence seems to permeate the air.

rooms.name: End Of Hallway
rooms.description: You have come to the end of the hallway.  The door leading to the library is to the north, but it now hangs on its hinges.  There is a window here, and it opens out to the garden.

extras.text: The garden is in rather bad shape. Weeds are growing everywhere. It seems like nobody has lived here for a very long time.

rooms.name: Behind The East Wing
rooms.description: You now wander on the ground behind the house's east wing.  The land shows traces of being well tended and planted with all sorts of herbs and vegetables. But now, the only thing that thrives here are weeds.  A large greenhouse is to the north.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: The hallway stretches southwards into the south wing of the house.  Under your feet, you notice that you are walking on what used to be a very high quality carpet, but moisture has ruined it.  Its once bright red colour has been reduced to a dirty brown.  There is an entrance to the east.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: You find that you have ventured into the dining room.  A long table dominates this room and a great, crystal chandelier hangs above.  However, it has been a very long time since this room was used by people as a thick layer of dust has settled on the table.

rooms.name: The Garden
rooms.description: You cautiously stalk the grounds behind the south wing of the house.  This part seems to have been the lawn.  Every once in a while, you trip on a croquet hoop.  The remains of deck chairs and tables are scattered on the ground. There is a large well to the east of here.

extras.text: The hoops are rusted, metal rings stuck in the ground. Ladies used to have parties around these things. It looks like they won't be seeing any more parties.

rooms.name: The Well
rooms.description: A large well dominates this end of the garden.  It is about 10 feet in diameter but only about 20 feet deep.  It may have served more as a fish pond, as you can see many fish skeletons on the dried out bottom.  To the north, you can see a greenhouse.  A little to the south is a gardener's shed.

extras.text: The bones are extremely weather beaten and yellowed. You find it strange however that the bones can be seen so obviously from the top of the well. Then you realise, the bones seem to be glowing a little.

rooms.name: End Of Hallway
rooms.description: You have come to the end of the hallway.  The carpet has made way to marble but there is still some brownish stuff on the ground.  A door opens out to the east.

rooms.name: The Kitchen
rooms.description: You find yourself in what used to be the kitchen of this house.  There are all sorts of utensils lying around on the ground, but it is all rusty or decayed.  Remnants of food can be seen encrusted on the fireplace.  A trapdoor leads down into the cellar.  A door opens out to the east into the garden.

Down.description: The trapdoor is covered in a fine layer of dust. It seems like no one has been down there in a long time.

rooms.name: The Garden
rooms.description: The garden has not been tended for a very long time.  The grass has grown to a height almost up to your waist.  There is a shed at the far east of the garden, Way to the north, you can see a greenhouse.

rooms.name: The Garden
rooms.description: The dense underbrush makes it rather difficult to walk but somehow you manage.  To the north, you can see a large well.  A small, wooden gardener's shed is here to the east.  At the south end of the garden there is a large pine tree.

rooms.name: Gardener's Shed
rooms.description: You dig around the dark and damp shed but there is very little of interest or value here.  All the gardening utensils have already decayed and rotted away.  The entire structure creaks as you move around.  It probably won't last very long.

rooms.name: The Garden
rooms.description: You are in the garden behind the south wing of the house.  This marks the end of the property.  The only exit is to the east.

rooms.name: The Weeping Willow
rooms.description: A large willow tree grows here, next to a dried up artificial lake.  Its branches hang close to the ground, bringing about a enclosed and suffocating feeling near it.  A hint of sadness can also be felt here, but it is probably your imagination.

extras.text: The lake was probably commissioned by one of the owners of the house who probably wanted the view. Years of disuse has clogged up the water inlet and the lake has already dried up.

rooms.name: The Garden
rooms.description: You stand between two large trees in the garden.  There is a pine tree to the east and a weeping willow to the west.  The house is towards the north.

rooms.name: The Pine Tree
rooms.description: A tall pine tree is growing here, just at the edge of the garden.  It's cool shade gives a sense of peace to this otherwise forsaken place.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Tattered drapes hang from the windows, their colour long faded.  A large bed is in the centre of the room, but the mattress is all moth eaten.  A thick layer of dust has settled on the ground.

extras.text: The springs are all rusty and jutting out of the mattress, and the quilts are all moth eaten. This would not make a good place to sleep in now, although it may have once been very comfortable.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Tattered drapes hang from the windows, their colour long faded.  A large bed is in the centre of the room, but the mattress is all moth eaten.  A thick layer of dust has settled on the ground.

extras.text: The springs are all rusty and jutting out of the mattress, and the quilts are all moth eaten. This would not make a good place to sleep in now, although it may have once been very comfortable.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Tattered drapes hang from the windows, their colour long faded.  A large bed is in the center of the room, but the mattress is all moth eaten.  A thick layer of dust has settled on the ground.

extras.text: The springs are all rusty and jutting out of the mattress, and the quilts are all moth eaten. This would not make a good place to sleep in now, although it may have once been very comfortable.

rooms.name: Stair Landing
rooms.description: You stand on the ornate stair landing of the house's first floor.  This seems to lead to the rooms of the owners and the guests as the furnishing here looks relatively better.  A long hallway leads to the east.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: The hallway is in an east-west direction.  There are rooms to the north and south.  Faded tapestries and paintings decorate the walls, marble statues line the hall, like sentinels of a bygone age.  Your footsteps are muffled here, as the carpet is still surprisingly thick.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: The hallway continues on to the west and east.  A large door is before you to the north.  It was probably a bedroom before the house was abandoned.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are at the eastern end of the hallway.  The hallway continues on to the west.  A large door is before you to the north.  It was probably a bedroom before the house was abandoned.  There is a rope attached to the ceiling above you.

Up.description: There is a rope attached to the trapdoor. A slight jerk should be able to bring it down.

rooms.name: Lounge
rooms.description: There are faded paintings hung on the walls of this room, and hunting trophies line the wall.  Lounge chairs are arranged all around the room, and empty wine bottles sit upon the shelves behind the bar.  A closet is to the east, which was once where the owner probably hung his coat.

East.description: There is a closet in that direction.

rooms.name: The Closet
rooms.description: It is dark and dank in this closet.  Tattered garments hang from the hangers.  It is rather obvious that the former occupants didn't bother to take their belongings with them.

East.description: A small, tilted doorway leads to the east.

West.description: The closet door is in that direction.

rooms.name: A Soul-less Den
rooms.description: The floor of this iniquitous room is uncomfortably soft and seems to pulsate with life.  A warm, viscous liquid drips languidly from the ceiling, splashes on your armor, and curdles, producing a most foul stench.  The walls are thick and dark, shielding the occupants from the intrusion of light and sound. There are strange machines strewn about in disrepair, and racks containing various flasks and test-tubes.  Huge volumes of dark knowledge, barely visible in the low light, line the walls.  There is a large desk here with tattered scraps of paper scattered all over it.

Down.description: A sliding floor panel offers exit below.

extras.text: A large, solid wood desk rests here covered by small scraps of paper.
Someone has just shredded some papers here into small pieces.  You attempt to piece the scraps back together to create the original message.

It reads: Fair Maiden, We have tried all that our science and medicine can offer, but alas I regret to inform you that your fiance has perished.  We would like to convey our most sincere and heartfelt apologies.  With Sympathy, The court doctors and scientist of the King.

rooms.name: The Attic
rooms.description: You sneeze involuntarily as your movement stirs up clouds of dust. Extremely large cobwebs hang from the corners of this attic.  Decayed remains of boxes and all sorts of junk you'd normally find in an attic litter the place.  It would be quite difficult to find anything in this dark and dank place.

rooms.name: The Attic
rooms.description: You sneeze involuntarily as your movement stirs up clouds of dust. Extremely large cobwebs hang from the corners of this attic.  Decayed remains of boxes and all sorts of junk you'd normally find in an attic litter the place.  It would be quite difficult to find anything in this dark and dank place.

rooms.name: The Attic
rooms.description: You sneeze involuntarily as your movement stirs up clouds of dust. Extremely large cobwebs hang from the corners of this attic.  Decayed remains of boxes and all sorts of junk you'd normally find in an attic litter the place.  It would be quite difficult to find anything in this dark and dank place.

rooms.name: The Attic
rooms.description: You sneeze involuntarily as your movement stirs up clouds of dust. Extremely large cobwebs hang from the corners of this attic.  Decayed remains of boxes and all sorts of junk you'd normally find in an attic litter the place.  It would be quite difficult to find anything in this dark and dank place.

rooms.name: The Attic
rooms.description: You sneeze involuntarily as your movement stirs up clouds of dust. Extremely large cobwebs hang from the corners of this attic.  Decayed remains of boxes and all sorts of junk you'd normally find in an attic litter the place.  It would be quite difficult to find anything in this dark and dank place.

rooms.name: The Attic
rooms.description: You sneeze involuntarily as your movement stirs up clouds of dust. Extremely large cobwebs hang from the corners of this attic.  Decayed remains of boxes and all sorts of junk you'd normally find in an attic litter the place.  It would be quite difficult to find anything in this dark and dank place.

rooms.name: The Cellar
rooms.description: You are in the cellar of this once great mansion.  Great casks which once held stores of wine now lie in decaying heaps on the ground.  The cellar is rather large and continues to extend to the east.  A ladder leads up back to the kitchen.

rooms.name: The Cellar
rooms.description: You have come to the end of the wine cellar.  As you walked down here, you get an eerie feeling which creeps down to your bones.  It's like there is something very sinister here.

East.description: As you poke and probe in that way, you notice a hairline crack in the wall... There is a secret panel here!

rooms.name: Earth Tunnel
rooms.description: You find yourself in a crudely dug tunnel leading northwards.  There is a smell of decay here, and you sense great hate in the surroundings.

East.description: After much digging and probing, you discover another secret passage in this direction.

West.description: The panel is here, leading back to the cellar.

rooms.name: Earth Tunnel
rooms.description: You find yourself in a crudely dug tunnel leading north and south.  There is a smell of decay here, and you sense great hate in the surroundings.

rooms.name: Earth Tunnel
rooms.description: You find yourself in a crudely dug tunnel leading south and west.  There is a smell of decay here, and you sense great hate in the surroundings.

rooms.name: The Bone Yard
rooms.description: Before you is a vast graveyard.  Human and animal bones are scattered throughout this place.  It would seem that the previous owner was involved in some macabre scheme as even to your untrained eye, it is obvious that these victims did not die an easy death.

extras.text: Upon inspection, you discover that the bones shows signs of being gnawed on. Whatever ate them seems to have quite large and sharp teeth.

rooms.name: The Bone Yard
rooms.description: Before you is a vast graveyard.  Human and animal bones are scattered throughout this place.  It would seem that the previous owner was involved in some macabre scheme as even to your untrained eye, it is obvious that these victims did not die an easy death.

extras.text: Upon inspection, you discover that the bones shows signs of being gnawed on. Whatever ate them seems to have quite large and sharp teeth.

rooms.name: The Bone Yard
rooms.description: Before you is a vast graveyard.  Human and animal bones are scattered throughout this place.  It would seem that the previous owner was involved in some macabre scheme as even to your untrained eye, it is obvious that these victims did not die an easy death.

extras.text: Upon inspection, you discover that the bones shows signs of being gnawed on. Whatever ate them seems to have quite large and sharp teeth.

rooms.name: The Bone Yard
rooms.description: Before you is a vast graveyard.  Human and animal bones are scattered throughout this place.  It would seem that the previous owner was involved in some macabre scheme as even to your untrained eye, it is obvious that these victims did not die an easy death.

extras.text: Upon inspection, you discover that the bones shows signs of being gnawed on. Whatever ate them seems to have quite large and sharp teeth.

rooms.name: The Bone Yard
rooms.description: Before you is a vast graveyard.  Human and animal bones are scattered throughout this place.  It would seem that the previous owner was involved in some macabre scheme as even to your untrained eye, it is obvious that these victims did not die an easy death.

extras.text: Upon inspection, you discover that the bones shows signs of being gnawed on. Whatever ate them seems to have quite large and sharp teeth.

rooms.name: The Bone Yard
rooms.description: Before you is a vast graveyard.  Human and animal bones are scattered throughout this place.  It would seem that the previous owner was involved in some macabre scheme as even to your untrained eye, it is obvious that these victims did not die an easy death.

extras.text: Upon inspection, you discover that the bones shows signs of being gnawed on. Whatever ate them seems to have quite large and sharp teeth.

rooms.name: A Private Study
rooms.description: Marvelous mahogany hardwood floors lie unscuffed and perfectly polished.  A faded painting of a man and a pale, blond haired women stare menacingly down. A large, oval mirror sits on the west wall, cracked and faded with age. Several small, half bookcases rest along the walls, and a large comfortable chaise is in front of a small fireplace.  The logs in the fire place burn brightly, illuminating the entire room quite nicely.  All in all this room is very comfortable and must have provided a fine refuge from the doldrums of everyday existence.

West.description: You admire yourself in a large oval mirror.  Dashing!

extras.text: A beautiful mirror with fine hand carved wood is here.  It really needs to be cleaned, it is covered with fingerprints.

rooms.name: The Alcove
rooms.description: This small area is choked with junk and dust.  It looks to be a small extension off a wide-open attic to the west.  There are no windows or doors anywhere, except a trapdoor that leads downward.

Down.description: The trapdoor creaks under your weight.

rooms.name: Earth Tunnel
rooms.description: This is a crude earthen tunnel.  It is directly beneath a building, and in fact there is a small opening in the floor above.  Light shines weakly down. The tunnel, which smells of decay, leads east.

Up.description: Light shines through a crack.  Could it be widened?
